H0.text: Liquid at room temperature is the state of copper because copper is a metal.

H1.text: Copper is nonreactive with other substances because it is a metal.

H2.text: A poor conductor of electricity is copper because it is a metal.

H3.text: A good conductor of heat is copper because it is a metal.

A5.text: Copper has high thermal conductivity, second highest among pure metals at room temperature.
